title: Jax is going to be insanely broken with stormraiders.
body:
Stormraider's Surge (Cunning, Tier 6)

Movement speed bonus increased to 40% from 35%
Now also grants 100% slow resistance for 3 seconds
Time frame to deal damage increased to 2.5 seconds from 2

Literally removes his only weakness in team fights, rofl.

This mastery will break high damage bruisers, dear god.

Actually imagine this on tryndamere...Basically Cant die or get kited by anything that isnt a hard CC, rofl.
